review: Have purchased 2 of these, one when they just came out and another a couple months later. Haven't had any issues and would purchase again!

review: The installation was quick & easy. Love the remote. Wish I would have purchased this for my other tv instead of the Google Chromecast.

review: Bought Fire Stick after having the Roku 3 and I prefer the Fire Stick. There are not as maNY commercials,when watching music videos.  A little harder to navigate through than Roku, but you get used to it. I would recommend it. I have 2 Firestick and plan on getting 2 more.
